title: Day 9 of menses, got white discharge, no shape, day 10 white thread like discharge, when to do ghusl
transcript: uh shake at the end of my menes on n9th day I get white discharge with no shape on 10th day I get white thread like discharge when should I take Buel when you get the white thread discharge or if you insert a tampon the day before in this case and it comes clean and pure in this case you do take your rul
